name: RI_1_1_22_Unlink_Record_Lifecycle_Event
title: RI.1.1.22 Unlink Record Lifecycle Event (Function)
description: Unlink Record Entries (2 or more instances)
purpose:
Occurs when an agent causes the system to disconnect two or more record entries previously connected, rendering them separate (disconnected) again. 

Reference: ISO 21089-2018, Section 15.22.

statement.label: RI.1.1.22#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL provide the ability to update multiple patient Record Entries by unlinking them according to scope of practice, organizational policy, and/or jurisdictional law.
